property.name: Effect
property.value: 2G - When summoned add a Cloud beast from your deck or graveyard to your hand

property.name: Effect
property.value: 4G - When summoned add a Cloud beast or Cloud Herder from your deck or graveyard to your hand

property.name: Effect
property.value: Passive 2G: Instead of being banished all Cloud Beasts are sent to the graveyard instead

property.name: Effect
property.value: Passive 2G: If a Wind monster is banished gain 5 LP

property.name: Effect
property.value: Passive 5LP: Whenever a Cloud Beast inflicts Battle damage gain 3 gold

property.name: Effect
property.value: Passive 2G: Whenever a Cloud Beast inflicts Battle damage gain 5 LP

property.name: Effect
property.value: Passive 3G: You gain an additional normal summon for Wind-Mages only

property.name: Effect
property.value: Passive 2G: If a Wind Monster is banished add a monster with 0 defense from your deck or graveyard to your hand

property.name: Effect
property.value: 5G: When summoned target a wind monster. That monster can attack twice this turn.

property.name: Effect
property.value: 4G: When summoned target a wind monster. That monster can attack twice on your next turn.

property.name: Effect
property.value: Flip 6G: If a Wind monster would be banished return it to your hand instead.

property.name: Effect
property.value: 6G: When summoned return all spell cards your opponent has on the field to the hand. Then your opponent draws 1 card for every card returned by this effect

property.name: Effect
property.value: Flip 3G: If your opponent attacks your lifepoints directly flip this card and banish one monster on the field whose attack is less than 20

property.name: Effect
property.value: 5LP: When summoned gain 5 gold

property.name: Effect
property.value: Flip 8LP: If your opponent attemps to remove this card from the field, flip this card and your opponent must pay 5 G

property.name: Effect
property.value: 10 G: This card can special summon itself from your hand but can't be used for tribute summon. Cannot attack the turn it was summoned. Cannot attack unless there is at least one Cloud Herder on your field. After this card attacks banish it.

property.name: Effect
property.value: 2 G: This card can special summon itself from your hand but can't be used for tribute summon. Cannot attack the turn it was summoned. Cannot attack unless there is at least one Cloud Herder on your field. After this card attacks banish it. Passive: When this card inflicts battle damage draw 2 cards.

property.name: Effect
property.value: 2 G: This card can special summon itself from your hand but can't be used for tribute summon. Cannot attack the turn it was summoned. Cannot attack unless there is at least one Cloud Herder on your field. After this card attacks banish it. If this card is banished draw 1 card. If this card is destroyed draw 2 cards

property.name: Effect
property.value: 3 G: This card can special summon itself from your hand but can't be used for tribute summon. Cannot attack the turn it was summoned. Cannot attack unless there is at least one Cloud Herder on your field. After this card attacks banish it. Passive: This card can attack in either player's battle phase

property.name: Effect
property.value: 10 G: This card can special summon itself from your hand but can't be used for tribute summon. Cannot attack the turn it was summoned. Cannot attack unless there is at least one Cloud Herder on your field. After this card attacks banish it. When summoned choose one wind-beast monster on your side of the field. It cannot be banished this turn.

property.name: Effect
property.value: 5 G: This card can special summon itself from your hand but can't be used for tribute summon. Cannot attack the turn it was summoned. Cannot attack unless there is at least one Cloud Herder on your field. After this card attacks banish it. When this card inflicts battle damage your opponent gives you 5 gold

property.name: Effect
property.value: 5 G: This card can special summon itself from your hand but can't be used for tribute summon. Cannot attack the turn it was summoned. Cannot attack unless there is at least one Cloud Herder on your field. After this card attacks banish it. Passive: If a cloud beast monster would be banished or destroyed shuffle it back into your deck and then receive gold equal to the amount it cost to special summon it.

property.name: Effect
property.value: All Wind Beasts deal piercing damage. +4G per turn

property.name: Effect
property.value: 8G: During this turn, if a monster on your side of the field would be banished, return it to your hand instead.

property.name: Effect
property.value: Pay Half your LP. Receive 10G.

property.name: Effect
property.value: 5G: In 3 turns receive 15G.

property.name: Effect
property.value: You can only use this effect once during this turn When a card asks you to pay gold this turn it's cost becomes zero. Next turn pay double its original cost.

property.name: Effect
property.value: 8 LP: For this turn only any effect that has a gold cost on wind monsters is reduced by 2.

property.name: Effect
property.value: Continuous 4G: Anytime your opponent gains LP gain half of what they gained.

property.name: Effect
property.value: 4G: Banish a Wind monster on your side of the field. Destroy one monster your opponent controls.

property.name: Effect
property.value: 5G: All wind mages summoned this turn get their attack reduced to 0 and their defense doubled. In 3 turns if that monster is still on the field, double it again and it gains weak shield. Weak Shield: Opponents can attack and reduce the defense equal to the attack.

property.name: Effect
property.value: L3 Wind Monster + L3 Wind Monster. 1G: When summoned deal 9 damage to your opponent's LP.

property.name: Effect
property.value: Wind monster + Wind monster. Passive 2G: Draw two cards if two or more monsters are banished during your opponent's turn

property.name: Effect
property.value: Cloud Herder monster + Cloud Herder monster. When summoned if there's a cloud beast on your side of the fild add 1 spell card from your deck to your hand.

property.name: Effect
property.value: Cloud beast monster + Cloud beast monster. Cannot attack the turn it's summoned. Cannot attack unless there's a cloud beast on your side of the field. After this card attacks, banish it. Passive: For every monster that's been banished, increase the attack of all Wind monsters by 5.

property.name: Effect
property.value: Lvl 8 Wind monster + Lvl 3 Wind monster. This card is unnafected by card effects. As long as this card remains on the field, opponents may only target this monster for an attack. Weak Shield: Opponents can attack and reduce the defense equal to the attack. 4G: When summoned disable one effect on the field except this card.
